name: Sankhara
description: Saṅkhāra is a poetic VR film inspired by T.S. Eliot's 'Four Quartets'.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8, windows 8.1, windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvideo GeForce GTX 780 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8, windows 8.1, windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 4 MB RAM Graphics: Nvideo GeForce GTX 960 Storage: 1 GB available space
